channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Vile Russia trolls celebrate Heathrow fire as 'Putin sabotage' and threaten to 'burn UK to hell'
item.description: The fire at an electrical substation in Hayes, west London, sparked travel chaos for hundreds of flights at Heathrow Airport with many being cancelled...

item.title: Driver saves £3,000 on her car costs with change most people know nothing about
item.description: Most UK drivers don't know you can do this but it could lead to massive savings, as it did for Charlotte on her Kia

item.title: Elderly drivers being forced off the road due to policy which is 'not legal'

item.title: Marcin Majerkiewicz GUILTY of chopping up housemate and dumping heart and genitals in bags for life
item.description: Marcin Majerkiewicz, 42, bludgeoned Stuart Everett to death before cutting his body up with a hacksaw and depositing the parts in different locations ...

item.title: Heathrow Airport closure fire 'being investigated by counter terrorism police'
item.description: The fire at an electrical substation in Hayes, west London, sparked travel chaos at Heathrow Airport with hundreds of flights being cancelled or diver...

item.title: Nine English words you probably didn’t know came from Irish
item.description: Some common words we use every day, including the name of one of the UK's main political parties, have a surprising origin in Irish.

item.title: ‘New Nostradamus’ made eerie prediction about an oil tanker explosion days before it happened
item.description: 'I saw a ship or something in trouble.'

item.title: Man claims he was shot by his dog while lying in bed
item.description: The Memphis man was 'relaxing/talking' in bed when the incident occurred

item.title: Who is Mark Carney? New Canadian PM’s family, career, and more
item.description: Mark Carney met his English wife Diana when they were both members of the Oxford University Ice Hockey Club.

item.title: Chicken lays anus clenchingly massive egg
